MAX7219:
MakeCode editor extension for single or multiple MAX7219 8x8 matrix LED modules
by Alan Wang
MAX7219.addCustomChr:
Add a custom character from a number array at the end of the extension's font library.
Each number in the array is 0-255, the decimal version of column's byte number.
MAX7219.brightnessAll: Set brightness level of LEDs on all MAX7219s
MAX7219.brightnessForOne: Set brightness level of LEDs on a specific MAX7219s (index 0=farthest on the chain)
MAX7219.clearAll: Turn off LEDs on all MAX7219s
MAX7219.clearForOne: Turn off LEDs on a specific MAX7219 (index 0=farthest on the chain)
MAX7219.displayCustomCharacter:
Print a custom character from a number array on the chain of MAX7219 matrixs at a specific spot. 
Each number in the array is 0-255, the decimal version of column's byte number.
Offset value -8 ~ last column of matrixs. 
You can choose to clear the screen or not (if not it can be used to print multiple string on the MAX7219 chain).
MAX7219.displayLEDsForOne: Set LEDs of a specific MAX7219s to a pattern from a 8x8 number matrix variable (index 0=farthest on the chain)
MAX7219.displayLEDsToAll: Set LEDs of all MAX7219s to a pattern from a 8x8 matrix variable (index 0=farthest on the chain)
MAX7219.displayText:
Print a text accross the chain of MAX7219 matrixs at a specific spot. 
Offset value -8 ~ last column of matrixs. 
You can choose to clear the screen or not (if not it can be used to print multiple string on the MAX7219 chain).
MAX7219.fillAll: Turn on all LEDs on all MAX7219s
MAX7219.fillForOne: Turn on LEDs on a specific MAX7219
MAX7219.fontDemo: Display all fonts in the extension font library
MAX7219.getCustomCharacterArray:
Return a number array calculated from a 8x8 LED byte array 
(example: B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000)
MAX7219.getEmptyMatrix: Return a empty 8x8 number matrix variable
MAX7219.getFullMatrix: Return a full 8x8 number matrix variable
MAX7219.getValueFromMatrix: Return a specific value from a 8x8 number matrix variable
MAX7219.randomizeAll: Turn on LEDs randomly on all MAX7219s
MAX7219.randomizeForOne: Turn on LEDs randomly on a specific MAX7219 (index 0=farthest on the chain)
MAX7219.scrollText: Scroll a text accross all MAX7219 matrixs for once
MAX7219.setValueInMatrix: Set a specific value in a 8x8 number matrix variable
MAX7219.togglePower: Turn on or off all MAX7219s
MAX7219.toogleValueInMatrix: Toggle (between 0/1) a specific value in a 8x8 number matrix variable
